description: HTTPSDConfig defines a HTTP service discovery configuration. See [here](https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victoriametrics/sd_configs/#http_sd_configs)

authorization.description: Authorization header to use on every scrape request.

basicAuth.description: BasicAuth information to use on every scrape request.

proxyURL.description: ProxyURL eg http://proxyserver:2195 Directs scrapes to proxy through this endpoint.

proxy_client_config.description: ProxyClientConfig configures proxy auth settings for scraping See [feature description](https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victoriametrics/vmagent/#scraping-targets-via-a-proxy)

tlsConfig.description: TLS configuration to use on every scrape request

url.description: URL from which the targets are fetched.
